name: SingleValueEncodingContainer
desc: A container that can support the storage and direct encoding of a single non-keyed value.

items.name: var codingPath: [CodingKey]
items.desc: The path of coding keys taken to get to this point in encoding.

items.desc: Encodes a single value of the given type.
